text: Takheun lom pujoe bandum keu Tuhan Dum ayat Tuhan sit Neupeuleumah Akan Neupeudeuh bandum bak gata Tateupeue sigra hana meuilah Po gata hantom lale meu siat Buet gata meuhat Neungieng le Allah f Al-QASHASH (KISAH) Ngon nama Allah lon peuphon surat Tuhan Hadharat nyang Maha Murah Tuhanku Sidroe geumaseh that-that Donya akhirat rahmat Neulimpah
